title: Sanctuary
synopsis: Two Japanese survivors of the Khmer Rouge massacres in Cambodia vow to find a sanctuary, even if they have to build it themselves. Returning to Japan, they take seemingly opposite paths: one becomes a politician, the other a gangster.
characters: ['Houjou, Akira', 'Asami, Chiaki', 'Tokai', 'Isaoka, Norimoto', 'Ishihara, Kyoko', 'Sakura, Shuichi', 'Ozaki', 'Don Sagara', 'Tashiro, Reiji', 'Murata']
